Behavioral Modification

Behavioral modification techniques were also employed in MKUltra to control

human behavior. Researchers used positive reinforcement and punishment to

shape participant behavior, often without their knowledge or consent (4).

Notable Experiments and Controversies

One of the most infamous MKUltra experiments was the use of LSD on

unsuspecting individuals, including college students and mental patients.

These experiments were often conducted in secret, without proper oversight
